div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem Octauo die mensis
maij anno quo supra

The saide day James Wricht was gevin our' be Jonhne of Cullane
to William of gareauche eldar to serue him as Skippar' in his schipe

Curia legalis balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xjo
die maij quo supra

Alexander Rede thomas prat Dauid Kintor Dauid mathesone
thome Waus Alexander nachty patrius'us' overwrites 'k'. patricius chernside Jonhne thomsone
Dauid Spens georgius byssat thomas Symsone Willelmus
Wormet and Andreas cantuly qui Jurati dicunt quod quondam Ranaldus
tailyour' auus Richardi gareauche latoris presencium obiit vltimo vestitus est
sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri regis de quadam
terra interiore Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico castri ex boreali parte eiusdem
vici inter terram ex orientali ex vna et terram
ex occidentali partibus ab altera Et quod dictus Richardus est vnus
de legittimis et propinquioribus heredibus dicti quondam Ranaldi auj suj de dicta terra
cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra valet nunc per annum
de Supprimo
s' et tantum valuit tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite
de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et quod nunc existit
In manibus Agnetis Relicte quondam dicti Ranaldi in coniuncta infeodacione
pro toto tempore vite sue
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xij die maij

The saide day comperit Alexander chamer of murchill forspekar for the ayris
of William Wille chamer ande producit In Jugement ane chartir
of the Entre of William vmquhile thomas chamer his eme in
ane croft callit the Cuttingis liand at the gallowgate and ane Instrument
of Sesin of the Intre of William chamer his Sone in the samyn and
protestit that the ber' savyne in the saide croft be the prioris of the predicatoris turne tham to nay
preiudice

The said day the priour' of the freris predicatoris protestit Solempnitlie
that quhat thinge was done or said anent the croft callit the
Cuttingis her' suld' turne him nor the conuent of the saide place
to nay preiudice

The saide day Dauid mar' and Johne low beand' warnit be Androw
nachty seriand' to comper befor the balyeis to find' nichbourship to Alexander
chamer and Johne Colisone of certane croftis mercheand' with thar croftis
the said Dauid comperit and offerit him redy to mak pament
to Johne low of ale thingis that the s he hed to say or propone
In contrar' him or his said Croftis protestand quhat Skathis he
and his nichbouris Sustenis tharthrow to be recouerit apon the saide John

The saide day William of buchan was in ane amerciament of the court for the strubulance
of thomas vidaile in worde And' the said thomas in ane amerciament of
the Court for the wranguis' Strubulance of the said William be ane
Suorne assis' Robert blinsell forspekar and to Amend as law wil and
forber' In tyme to Cum ffor the quhilkis offence It was ordanit be the
assis' that thomas ridail sal ask the said' William forgevenes in
the Court and pay j li' of wax to S the halie blude mes' and licht
And gif euir the saide partiis offendis ony thinge tile vthiris and beis
conuict tharof befor ony Juge sal pay to Sanct nicholes Werk'
xl s' vnforgevin to the kepin and fulfillinge of this I batht the
said partiis was oblist be the fathtis of thar bodiis thar' handis
vphaldin

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvjo
die maij quo supra

Eodem Andreas Kennarty Emota Kennarty et Sponsa alexandri
K tailyour' conuicti per assisam ex ore patricij leslie pro perturbio
gilberti tulidef Cuj emendabunt ut iura volunt Et dictus
gilbertus amerciatur pro perturbio dicti Andree cuj emendabit ut iura
Insuper diliberatum fuit per assisam quod dicti volunt
andreas et Emota remanebunt infra pretorium do vsque in diem
lune pro satisfactione et emenda parte faciend'

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxij die maij
quo supra

Eodem die thomas narne in amerciamento Curie per confessionem proprie
lingue pro perturbio Richardi narne Cuj emendabit ut Jura
volunt

Eodem die thomas Waus deuenit plegii legalis quod Richardus narne
erit Indempnis pro thoma narne and parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris

Et patricius leslie deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus thomas erit
Indempnis pro dicto Ricardo et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris
et dicte partes obligantur ad conseruandum plegios suos Indempnes
pro huiusmodi fideiussione per manuum ostensionem

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
vicesimo quinto die mensis maij anno quo supra

The saide day the haill counsal and communite of Abirdene be oppin
premunicion and warning be thar hand bell throw the haill tone
gathtreit and circualie Inquerit be Johne menyis ane of the
balyeis of the said burghe with ane fre Intent voce and deliuerance
of thar' avne motywe for the redeming and outgretinge of thar
landis of bogferloche beinge wedsett ande for the reparacion bigin
and reforming of the queir' of thar parroche kirk of thar' glorious'
patrone Sanct nicholes ordanit ane assedacion generale vndir
thar commone Sele to be maid of ale wattiris fischingis landis
and Rentis pertening to thame to the nichbouris Induellaris of the said'
burghe' Ande chesit thir personis vndir writin thar' lauchfule
commissaris to Sett thar saide wattiris fischingis Rentis and landis
for the termes of fywe yeris that is to say Dauid menyeis aldirman
Alexander chamer the fadir Alexander menyeis Robert blinsell sere Johne ruthirfurd'
Alexander rede John Colisone Johne' of Cullan and thomas prat
Ande ordanit ane commission vndir thar' commone Sele to be
writin and deliuerit to thame to Sett the samyn eftir thar'
aithis discrecione and Conscience quhilkis commissaris beande
present deponit the greit aithez to Sett the saide Wattiris fischingis
and landis eftir the forme and tenour' of the said commission' grantit to tham

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem Sexto
die Junij anno quo Supra

The said day It was fundin be ane Suorne assis' Alexander
sanquhar' forspekar that the Sett of the hous' maid be James of
Kintor to Elizibeth' Dauisone is of availe and the sett maid to John
Colly be James Kintorris wif is nocht of availe et cetera

The saide day the bailyeis assigit monunday cum xv dais to
Alexander sanquhar to ansuer to the borghe strekit one him be
Johne talyouris for the wranguis' haldin fra him of his part of xxtj merkis
s' xxx d' of le Siluer for a bage of xj d' of lent Siluer

Eodem die Alexander rolland filius quondam Willelmi rolland fecit constituit
creauit nominauit Johannem menyeis burgensem burgi de Abirdene suum verum legittimum
et Indubitatem procuratorem Irreuocabilem ad petendum et deliberandum quoddam breue capelle regie
Inquisicionis per ipsum Impetrat' preposito et ballivis eiusdem burgi et Idem debite exe
cucioni mandare Retornat' ad dictam capellam remittere sasinamque
hereditariam terre seu terrarum nomine suo petere et recipere easdem per appunctuatum vendere
seu alienare ceteram omnia et Singula facere et exercere necessaria
Seu oportuna promitten' de Rato et grato Judicio Cisti et in vberiore
forma procuratorij Testibus gilberto riburne patricio Clerk Ricardo redhed'
burgensibus

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiij
die Junij anno quo supra

the said day Johne Duncansone grantit that he hed sett
to mathow pacok the chamer that george talyour Inhabitis
and Androw fyf procurator to the said mathow requirit the said
george to deuoyd and remoywe the said chamer quhilkis
the said george grantit to deuoid' et cetera

The saide day Jonhne Duncansone oblist him be the fatht
of his bodie to content to pay to george talyour' his mache
Sevin merkis vsual money of Scotland for his mariage
gudis promittit for the mariage of his cistir be him at thar
thar termes tua merkis at mydsommur' next hereftir tua merkis
att mertymes next thareftir And' xl s' betuix that and Witsonday
next thareftir And' atour the said Jonhne grantit his forbutht
fre to the said george for this Instant yer' for the quhilkis
the said george sale gif ane Sufficient acquitance of ale
thingis to the said Jonhne

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvj die
Junij anno quo supra

the saide day the balyeis assignit this day viij dais to
Johne low to ansuer' to the borghe strekit one him be Dauid
mar' for the wranguis' haldinge fra him of ane assedacion'
concerning' certane Croftis pertening to him perempturlie with consent
of batht the said partiis

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xix die
Junij anno quo supra

The saide day the ballieis with consent of batht the said partiis
assignit this day aucht dais to gilbert menyeis William Wormet
Dauid Steuarte and henry red to ansuer' perempturlie to the borghe
Strekit one tham be thomas mar' for certan frankis and costis
maid' be the said thomas In Deip And the said thomas to ansuer'
to tham In ale thingis that thai haue to say to him

The saide day the balyeis assignit tuysday at next cumis'
to thomas mar' to ansuer to the borghe Strekit one him
be henry red for the wranguis' haldin fra him of fiwe
crovnis frankis perempturlie with consent of batht the said partiis

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Johne
of Cullane forspekar that the wyf of James Duncansone brocht
fodir out of rubislaw to Abirdene and sauld it

Curia legalis balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxij
die Junij anno quo supra

The saide day Androw branche one that ane part Ande Johne litstar
one that vthir part oblist tham be thar' handis vphaldin to stand at
the ordinance of Williame andirsone eldar and Johne lammyntone
anent xviij s' clamit be the said Androw and his wyff

The saide day Alexander Sanquhar' lauchfullie callit and nocht comperit
to ansuer to the borghe strekit one him be Johne talyour for the
wranguis' withhaldin for him of his part of xxtj merkis et cetera tharfor
the balyeis ordanit henry orvm officiar' to pas' and tak ane
distres' of the said Alexandris and lat it agan to borghe and It be
askit And warne him to this day xv dais at the secunde thrid day
of process'

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxiij die
Junij

Eodem die continuatur plegium porrectum per Dauid mar super Johannem
low vsque in feriam Sextam proximam sequens cum consensu parcium

The saide day Willekin Schipar said thar was ane stik
of quhit clath castin out of his schip this last rais' pertening
to patrik leslie Ande he forbad' thame to cast ony gudis
the said tyme

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvj die Junij
quo supra

the said' day Jonhne rossal grantit him to haue resavit fra Alexander
Red mastir of the werk x merkis thomas berry grantit him
resavit xj merkis vij s' and iiij d' and Alexander Stute grantit him resavit
x merkis vij d' and iiij d' and Robert Wricht x merkis vj s' viij d'

Eodem die Compertum fuit Inquisicionem curie quod Walterus
atkin est legitimus et propinquior heres quondam Ebote Kintor matris
sue

The saide day Dauid Spens deliuerit to Wat atkin ane red
kirtill j blak govne j brone hud and j rede Siluer tuschay
and j par of bak clokis of his modir clethin In part of pament of
his ayrschip gif thar' be nay bettir gudis for the quhilkis Alexander
chamer of murchill come Souerte to kep the said Dauid skathles

The saide day thomas mar' protestit for costis Skathis dampnis
and expensis gif he ony Sustenis be the excepcionis tane be William
Wormet Ande the assignit this day xv dais to the said' William
to ansuer' to the borghe strekit one him be the said thomas

The saide day Jonhne low was present to ansuer' to the borghe strekit
one him be Dauid mar' and protestit he suld' nocht be hurt quhile
he war' new warnit to ansuer' to the said borghe

Eodem die continatur plegium porrectum per Dauid mar' super Johannem
low vsque tercium diem Julij propter debilitatem Curie

The saide Dauid mar' was present offeringe redy to follow Johne
low be the borghe strekit one him for the wranguis' haldin
fra him of ane assedacion concerning his croftis protestit for remed
of law and tharof askit Instrument witnes thomas mar' Androw
Waus David mar' yongar Johne Sanclar' thomas Jamesone
and Johne Williamsone dempstar'

The said day the balyeis assignit tuysday that next cumis to thomas
mar' to ansuer' to the borghe strekit one him be canny ancroft
anent the releuyn of hir' of ane boyt et cetera
